message: This is a high-quality product, worth $125 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, a 20% discount. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only selling this product at this price today. If you don't buy it now, I'll have to sell it to someone else at a higher price later.
I'll take it!

I've got a great deal for you! This product is a rare find, and I'm willing to let it go for $100, which is a significant discount from its actual value. It's a unique opportunity to get a product that's worth more than its price tag. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on the risk of you not knowing its true value. What do you say?
I'm not sure if I should take the risk, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your hesitation last time, but I assure you that this product is a great opportunity. I'll sweeten the deal by offering a 10-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product, you can return it within 10 days and get a full refund. This way, you can try it risk-free. The product is still a great value at $100, and I'm confident you'll love it.
